resources.string:
The building is on fire!
You have 10 minutes
to go down to the Lobby.
You have 8 floors to go throw.
In each floor you will have a riddle
and only after you will solve the riddle
you can go down to a lower floor.
Good Luck! :)
Find the right button to press in order to go to lower floor
Solve the math problems in order to go to lower floor
Translate the Roman letters into digits in order to go to lower floor.
Press each color button exactly as the number of the shapes in the same color appearing on the wall in order to go to lower floor
Try to use the colors on the plant in order to go to lower floor
Move the metal ball onto the button in the middle in order to go to lower floor
Change the zeros into the correct numbers according to the above numbers in order to go to lower floor
Pay attention to the flashing buttons and guess the right Morse code in order to go to lower floor
Good job!\nYou have exit the building safely!
Game Over!\nYou didn\'t manage \nto exit on time!
